DOC.brief_summary: Improvement sleep quality emphysema patient desirable . Yet , data patient treat RePneu coil . This monocenter prospective study investigates effect sleep quality RePneu coil reduction dynamic hyperinflation advance disease stage pulmonary emphysema . Patient 's sleep study three Polysomnography measurement night , one prior Coil Treatment , one six month , one twelve month . Primary objective investigate difference sleep quality 6 12 month Coil Treatment . Further endpoint change daily activity sleep ( actigraphy ) , 6MWT , lung function parameter , questionnaire ( SGRQ , mMRC dyspnoe scale ) .
